ARTA.JK.summary: PT Arthavest Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospitality business in Central Jakarta. The company owns and operates Redtop, a 4-star business hotel with 390-suite rooms. Its Redtop hotel offers convention and banquet, meeting rooms, and business center, as well as sports center and spa. The company also provides information technology and payment system services. The company was formerly known as PT Artha Securities Tbk. PT Arthavest Tbk was founded in 1990 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Arthavest Tbk is a subsidiary of Lucas SH CN.

BUVA.JK.summary: PT Bukit Uluwatu Villa Tbk operates environmental friendly hotels and resorts in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Hotel; Lifestyle, Recreation, and Entertainment; and Real Estate. The company primarily owns and operates Alila Ubud, Alila Manggis, Alila Villas Uluwatu, Alila SCBD, and Dialoog Banyuwangi properties. It provides hospitality, food, and beverage services; trading, construction, industrial, agricultural, printing, transportation, and workshop services; and hotel guest rooms and restaurant services. The company also sells land or villas. PT Bukit Uluwatu Villa Tbk was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

CLAY.JK.summary: PT Citra Putra Realty Tbk engages in the property and hospitality business in Indonesia. The company operates hotels. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Citra Putra Realty Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Citra Putra Mandiri.

EAST.JK.summary: PT Eastparc Hotel Tbk owns and operates hotels in Indonesia. It operates Eastparc Hotel, a 5 star hotel with 189 guestrooms located in Yogyakarta. PT Eastparc Hotel Tbk is based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia.

ESTA.JK.summary: PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk owns and operates a hotel under the Hotel 88 name in Indonesia. The company's Hotel 88 operates a total of 70 rooms located in Bekasi City. It also engages in the rental of shops, as well as rental and trade of passenger cars. The company was formerly known as PT Esta Asri Propertindo and changed its name to PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk in September 2019. PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in South Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Esta Utama Corpora.

FITT.JK.summary: PT Hotel Fitra International Tbk owns and operates hotels in Indonesia. The company operates Fitra Hotel, a three-star hotel with 113 rooms located in Majalengka. It also provides travel and tourism services. The company is based in Majalengka, Indonesia.

HOTL.JK.summary: PT. Saraswati Griya Lestari Tbk operates in the field of hospitality in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Hotel and Property. It operates hotels, condotels, and resorts. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Saraswati Griya Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tiara Realty.

HRME.JK.summary: PT Menteng Heritage Realty Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates hotels in Indonesia. The company owns The Hermitage, a hotel located in Menteng, Central Jakarta. It is also involved in mining; general trading and services; and sea and domestic transportation businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Citra Prestasi Abadi and changed its name to PT Menteng Heritage Realty Tbk in October 2007. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Menteng Heritage Realty Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wijaya Wisesa Realty.

ICON.JK.summary: PT Island Concepts Indonesia Tbk engages in the catering and maintenance services in Indonesia. The company also provides accommodation services. In addition, it engages in the sale of house, and lot and condotel; and property development activities. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Kuta, Indonesia.

IKAI.JK.summary: PT Intikeramik Alamasri Industri Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells porcelain tiles in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Ceramic Industry and Hotel Industry. It also engages in the hospitality business. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

INDO.JK.summary: PT Royalindo Investa Wijaya, through its subsidiaries, operates boarding facilities in Indonesia. The company operates two boarding facilities, including the PJ Mansion boarding house and Puri Cempaka 04 boarding house located in Central Jakarta. PT Royalindo Investa Wijaya was founded in 2005 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

INPP.JK.summary: PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk develops, owns, and operates hotels and resorts in Indonesia. The company also engages in the real estate, general trading, and development businesses, as well as in the ownership of shopping centers, office buildings, and apartments. The company was formerly known as PT Penta Karsa Lubrindo and changed its name to PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk in 2004. PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

JAK1.MU.long_name: PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk
JAK1.MU.summary: PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel and property businesses in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Hotel, Real Estate, Telecommunication Services, and Hotel Management Services. The Hotel segment owns and operates two hotels under the Hotel Borobudur Jakarta and Ritz-Carlton Pacific Place names. The Real Estate segment engages in the real estate development business and services, including the construction of office buildings, shopping malls, and trade centers, as well as their supporting facilities; leasing of office buildings and rooms, and shopping mall complex units, as well as their supporting facilities; provision of infrastructures and facilities for integrated commercial centers construction, commercialization, and development; and provision of general services with the exception of legal and financial services. The Telecommunication Services segment offers telecommunication service management, closed fixed network, Internet service provider and its feature, and data center and managed services. The Hotel Management Services segment manages and operates Hotel Borobudur Jakarta, Discovery Kartika Plaza Hotel, Discovery Hotel & Convention Ancol, and Palace Hotel Cipanas. The company also engages in the tourism and related activities; and apartment development and trading businesses. PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

JIHD.JK.long_name: PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk
JIHD.JK.summary: PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel and property businesses in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Hotel, Real Estate, Telecommunication Services, and Hotel Management Services. The Hotel segment owns and operates two hotels under the Hotel Borobudur Jakarta and Ritz-Carlton Pacific Place names. The Real Estate segment engages in the real estate development business and services, including the construction of office buildings, shopping malls, and trade centers, as well as their supporting facilities; leasing of office buildings and rooms, and shopping mall complex units, as well as their supporting facilities; provision of infrastructures and facilities for integrated commercial centers construction, commercialization, and development; and provision of general services with the exception of legal and financial services. The Telecommunication Services segment offers telecommunication service management, closed fixed network, Internet service provider and its feature, and data center and managed services. The Hotel Management Services segment manages and operates Hotel Borobudur Jakarta, Discovery Kartika Plaza Hotel, Discovery Hotel & Convention Ancol, and Palace Hotel Cipanas. The company also engages in the tourism and related activities; and apartment development and trading businesses. PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

MAMI.JK.summary: PT Mas Murni Indonesia, Tbk owns, operates, and manages the Garden Palace Hotel located in Surabaya, Indonesia. It operates through Hospitality Services; Office Space Rental Services; and Catering, Laundry and Recreation Services segments. The company also owns the Crystal Garden, an apartment block and shopping center. It also engages in the restaurant, club, fitness center, advertising, entertainment, fisheries, aquaculture, livestock, and general trading activities, as well as provision of laundry service business; construction and development of residential and real estate properties; and trading of food and beverages. The company was formerly known as PT Rantai Mas Murni and changed its name to PT Mas Murni Indonesia, Tbk in October 1971. PT Mas Murni Indonesia, Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

MINA.JK.summary: PT Sanurhasta Mitra Tbk engages in property development and hospitality business in Indonesia. It primarily develops housing projects; and manages cottages. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

NATO.JK.summary: PT Surya Permata Andalan Tbk develops and operates boutique hotels, villas, and resorts in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Nusantara Properti Internasional Tbk. PT Surya Permata Andalan Tbk is based in Bali, Indonesia.

PGLI.JK.long_name: PT Pembangunan Graha Lestari Indah Tbk
PGLI.JK.summary: PT Pembangunan Graha Lestari Indah Tbk engages in the hotel and restaurant businesses in Indonesia. The company owns and operates a hotel under the Travellers Suites name; restaurants under the Le Chic name; and a banquet and restaurant under the Tia CafÃ© name. It also generates hydroelectricity power. PT Pembangunan Graha Lestari Indah Tbk was founded in 1994 and is based in Medan, Indonesia.

PLAN.JK.summary: PT Planet Properindo Jaya engages in hotels, restaurants, and tourism consulting activities. It operates Vue Palace hotel, a 4-star hotel located in Bandung. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Bandung, Indonesia.

PSKT.JK.summary: PT Red Planet Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospitality business in Indonesia. The company also provides function, accommodation, and recreation services. It owns and operates eight hotels located in Jakarta, Bekasi, Makassar, Palembang, Pekanbaru, Solo, Surabaya, and Bukittinggi. The company was formerly known as PT Pusako Tarinka Tbk and changed its name to PT Red Planet Indonesia Tbk in May 2014. PT Red Planet Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Red Planet Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Red Planet Holdings (Indonesia) Limited.

SHID.JK.long_name: PT Hotel Sahid Jaya International Tbk
SHID.JK.summary: PT Hotel Sahid Jaya International Tbk engages in the hotel and accommodation businesses in Indonesia. It also leases facilities related to the hotel business; and offers management and other services for hotel and tourism sectors. PT Hotel Sahid Jaya International Tbk was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Hotel Sahid Jaya International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Empu Sahid International.

SNLK.JK.summary: PT Sunter Lakeside Hotel Tbk operates a 4-star luxury hotel in North Jakarta. Its hotel provides guest rooms and suites, as well as various facilities and amenities, which include Internet, meeting rooms, banquet ballrooms, gym and fitness center, swimming pool, tennis courts, airport shuttle services, and others. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SOTS.JK.summary: PT Satria Mega Kencana Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates hotels under the Sotis brand in Indonesia. It also owns and leases real estate properties; and offers food and beverages. In addition, the company is involved in the professional, scientific, and technical activities, as well as construction services. Further, it provides spa services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
